description: A humorous blend of bee and sheep behaviors
title: Bah-Humbug
n_1: On a sunny day, Buzz the bee met Baa the sheep.
n_2: They talked about their day under the warm sun.
c1_2: Fancy a race to the flowers?
n_3: Buzz and Baa raced through the meadow, laughing.
c1_3: You're pretty fast for a sheep!
c2_3: And you're slow for a bee!
n_4: At the finish line, they both panted, happy and tired.
